headline.main: Turkey to Allow Family of Syrian Pilot Who Crashed to Visit Him: PM
headline.print_headline: Turkey to Allow Family of Syrian Pilot Who Crashed to Visit Him: PM

lead_paragraph: Turkey will allow the family of a Syrian air force pilot whose warplane crashed on Turkish territory to visit him at the hospital where he is being treated, Prime Minister Binali Yildirim told A Haber broadcaster on Monday.
snippet: Turkey will allow the family of a Syrian air force pilot whose warplane crashed on Turkish territory to visit him at the hospital where he is being treated, Prime Minister Binali Yildirim told A Haber broadcaster on Monday....
